attributes.action: create a UK-wide national counter-terrorism police agency
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the current threat the UK faces from terrorism why is it left to London's Metropolitan Polices Counter terrorism command to investigate terrorism in the UK? It would be more efficent and effective to have a nationwide police agency that can liase with the security services and local police forces to combat terrorism all over the country.
